<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157444</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2582</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Waste water purification</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abwasserreinigung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Purification d'eaux résiduaires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Purification de água waste</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Purificazione delle acque di rifiuto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθαρισμός υγρών αποβλήτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Purificación del agua inútil</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demostrates the different steps in treatment and purifucation of waste water.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">waste water</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation die demostrates die 
unterschiedlichen Jobsteps in der Behandlung und im purifucation des 
Abwassers.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui demostrates les différentes 
étapes dans le traitement et le purifucation des eaux résiduaires.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demostrates as etapas diferentes
no tratamento e no purifucation da água waste.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che demostrates i punti differenti
nel trattamento ed in purifucation di acque di rifiuto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που demostrates τα διαφορετικά στάδια
στην επεξεργασία και το purifucation των υγρών αποβλήτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demostrates los diversos pasos
de progresión en el tratamiento y el purifucation del agua inútil.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abwasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">eaux résiduaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água waste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acque di rifiuto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υγρά απόβλητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">agua inútil</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

            <value>final</value>

          <contribute>

          <context>

        <classification>

          <taxonPath>
